sentences.cn: 他的孙子以他的名字命名.

sentences.en: I often get letters that addressed to my namesake David.
sentences.cn: 我经常收到寄给和我同名的David的 信.

sentences.en: I often get letters that are addressed to my namesake down the street.
sentences.cn: 我常收到一些写给这条街上与我同姓名者的信件.

sentences.en: In 1938 they pooled $ 538 to find their namesake Hewlett - Packard in a rented garage.
sentences.cn: 1938年他们集资538美元,在租来的一个车库中建立了以合姓命名的“ 惠普 ”公司.

sentences.en: Like his famous namesake, young Washington had a brave, adventurous spirit.
sentences.cn: 像和他同名的那位名人一样，小华盛顿也有勇敢的冒险精神。

sentences.en: Mr. Booth said he is nervous about stepping into the public with the grant namesake school.
sentences.cn: 布斯说,他对因捐赠和以其名字命名的商学院而走入公众视野感到紧张.

sentences.en: My mother, born Juliana Ossorguine, is her direct descendant and namesake.
sentences.cn: 我母亲茱莉安娜?欧瑟昆正是她的直系后裔,而且是以她的名字来命名的.

sentences.en: Notre-Dame Cathedral in Senlis is less famous than its namesake in Paris.
sentences.cn: 桑利斯的圣母院不如在巴黎与其同名的圣母院有名。

sentences.en: She's my namesake but we're not related.
sentences.cn: 她与我同姓,但我们不是亲戚.

sentences.en: Still, some investors have called for the company to sell namesake division.
sentences.cn: 但是, 仍有一些投资家要求卖掉这个出版集团.

sentences.en: The incident allowed Yang s teammate and namesake to win the silver medal.
sentences.cn: 这件事使与杨扬名字音同字不同的队友(杨阳)获得了银牌.

sentences.en: Unlike his more famous namesake, this Bill Clinton has little interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 这位比尔∙克林顿和那位著名的同名人不同，对政治没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: Wines made from certain grapes will adopt the name of the grape as the namesake.
sentences.cn: 用特定品种的葡萄酿造的葡萄酒可以用品种命名.

sentences.en: Winston churchill has been almost as versatile as his English namesake.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿邱吉尔与他同名的人一样几乎是通才.

trans.tran_cn: 同姓的人，同名的人，同姓名的人，同名的事物
trans.tran_en: another person, especially a more famous person, who has the same name as someone
